resources.string: Lock volume buttons to media volume
Volume buttons control media volume only

\'Media Volume only\' needs to be activated for making the change of the volume buttons control valid.\n\n\'Settings\' \u2192 \'Accessibility\' \u2192 \'Service\' \u2192 \'Media Volume only\' \u2192 On

If \'Media Volume only\' is not needed anymore, it can be deactivated in \'Accessibility\' as well, so it\'s not on the list anymore for Android to check.\n\n\'Settings\' \u2192 \'Accessibility\' \u2192 \'Service\' \u2192 \'Media Volume only\' \u2192 Off
\'Media Volume only\' needs to be activated for making the change of the volume buttons control valid.\nPlease go to \'Settings\' \u2192 \'Accessibility\' and check \'Service\'
Need permission to read phone status
When you are on a call, you may want to adjust the call volume - not the media volume in this case. Thatâ€™s why this app needs permission to read the phone status to check that you are on a call.
\'Media Volume only\' needs to be activated for making the change of the volume buttons control valid.

Developer : Raphael Kim

Thanks to :
Johannes Peter (German / English; Icon)

\'Media Volume only\' provides the option to lock the volume buttons to media volume without draining battery life. This is one of many features of the app \'NGC 4388\' from the same developer.\nIf you want to try \'NGC 4388\', that has much more options, tap here to download \'NGC 4388\' from \'Play Store\'.
